metadata.title: CVE-2019-3860 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An out of bounds read flaw was discovered in libssh2 before 1.8.1 in theway SFTP packets with empty payloads are parsed. A remote attacker whocompromises a SSH server may be able to cause a Denial of Service or readdata in the client memory.

criterions.comment: libssh2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
